text: Javier Bernardo Usabiaga Arroyo (20 August 1939 â€“ 9 September 2018) was a Mexican businessman and politician. He was born in Celaya, Guanajuato. Usabiaga Arroyo was a member of the National Action Party. He was Secretary of Agriculture during part of Vicente Fox's government. From 2009 to 2012, he was Deputy of the LXI Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Guanajuato. Usabiaga Arroyo died of throat cancer on 9 September 2018 in Mexico City at the age of 79.Fallece Javier Usabiaga, secretario de Agricultura en sexenio de Fox ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:People from Guanajuato (state)
title: Javier Usabiaga Arroyo
